features: 3000mWh High Capacity: EBL AA rechargeable batteries with advanced high density lithium cells, makes our batteries lasting longer than other batteries at same capacity.

1.5V Steable Output: These AA lithium batteries can provide 1.5V constant output, stronger power and better performance than 1.2v Ni-MH batteries, ideal for high power consumption devices, such as toys, game controller, cameras and more.

Durable Rechargeable Battery: EBL rechargeable AA Li-ion batteries can be recharged up to 1,200 cycles, no memory effect, longer battery service life.(NOTE: THESE LITHIUM BATTERIES CAN ONLY BE CHARGED BY EBL M7012/M7011 1.5V LI-ION BATTERY CHARGER)
Lightweight and Powerful: These lithium batteries are lightweight but high energy density, it can work continuously and output efficiently, help your devices work better.
Multiple Battery Protection: Built in smart security chip, protect the battery against explosion. Every EBL batteries had been tested many times to ensure safe use, extend service life.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: EBL Rechargeable AA Lithium Batteries - Long Lasting and High Performance Continuously Strong Power Provide 1.5V constant output,excellent high discharge performance in your devices. Ultra Long Lasting AA Lithium ion cells with 3000mWh capacity, higher energy density and longer working time. Rechargeable Lithium Batteries Replacement battery for disposable AA batteries, longer battery life. No leakage and safer Adopt new anti-corrosion and anti-aging metal shell, explosion-proof and leak-proof liquid. More reliable to use. Wide application: EBL AA batteries are widely used in household devices like toys, remote controls, hand held games, flashlights, alarm-clock, toothbrushes, Shavers, cordless phone and more NOTE： This lithium battery can only be charged by EBL 1.5V Lithium Battery Charger- M7012, M7011

Low Self-Discharge One of the advantage for li-ion batteries is low self-discharge, make the batteries hold the charge when you not use them for a long time. High Performance in Extreme Temperatures Always reliable and useable with temperatures ranging from -40℉ to 140℉. Superior performance under low temperature conditions. ProCyco (Professional Recycle) 1200 Tech, ProCyco (Professional recycle) helps maximize its best power performance while charging. Does not contain Hg/Cd/Pb, longer battery life and energy saving.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great warranty service
reviews.reviewText: I put the battery into smoke detectors. 2 of 8 battery died without warning. can't be detected or charged. I will contact the warranty service and update this review.update: EBL contacted me and offered me replacement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They simply stop charging, unreliable
reviews.reviewText: The first set I bought worked really well for many months then stopped holding a charge long before they really should have, so I bought a second set and they stopped charging almost immediately. $70 down the drain. I will never buy EBL again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highest power of any AAA rechargeable batteries.
reviews.reviewText: Highest power of any AAA rechargeable batteries.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Arrived dead without being charged
reviews.reviewText: This is my 3rd purchase of this brand of batteries.I've used the other 2 sets of 8 in trail cams. They do not last as long as a lithium battery pack which makes no sense. I've changed\charged the batteries about a dozen times now and one set has 2 batteries that complete the charge an hour before the other 6. The other set takes about 2 hours longer to charge.With this specific purchase, the batteries arrived dead. I was not able to locate an expiration date. It took about 3-4 hours to charge them. They must have been sitting on a shelf for a decade to have arrived dead when the batteries say they are pre-charged and ready to be used on them.When you have 8 batteries in one device and suddenly 2 of them charge more quickly than the others it means either 2 or the other 6 batteries are going bad because they should all be depleted together and charge to full together. Having one set take 1-2 hours longer to charge is also not a good sign. It could be the charger, but I marked it so that I will know next week when I charge the two sets again if one charger is taking longer than the other. Both chargers are the same correct model for these batteries.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works fine in blink cameras and doorbell.
reviews.reviewText: Tired of recycling lithium batteries so I decided to go rechargeable. Been using in my blink cameras and doorbell for over 3 months. No issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for battery powered LED decor.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these in hopes that they would help me be less wasteful with my batteries, especially for holiday decor, specifically LED pictures and LED light strings. During the first 4-5 hours of operation, they work great! Lights are BRIGHT. But after this time frame it's a crap shoot on whether they need to be recharged.For... and giggles I ended up putting some standard alkaline batteries in one string of LED lights and these in another string, identical to the other. The alkaline batteries have outlasted these BY FAR. While the alkalines have dimmed quite a bit, they still power the lights while I've had to recharge these 5-7, which is disappointing. While they definitely outshine the alkalines in brightness, they just don't crank out power over time. At all.Pros:+ Rechargable (half a star)+ charger uses USB power, which is GREAT. I can't emphasize this enough. (two stars.)+ when it does power my devices, it powers them at full power the whole time the device is on. (Half star)Cons:- Expensive (minus half star)- Seems to be on full blast for a much shorter period of time and then dies. (Minus star)- takes 4 hours ish to charge. (Minus half star)Other thoughts... Maybe I just don't understand how the battery works? What ever the case, it's annoying that my alkalines last longer for my specific use case, especially for the price. I used EBL batteries while stationed in Germany, without issue and is why I purchased these. I'm curious if NiCad batteries would be better suited for my use case?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works for me long battery life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Provides proper voltage for devices that need it; short life; gets hot
reviews.reviewText: In theory, these are great; they provide 1.5v+, which is important for some devices that cannot tolerate the 1.2v that NiMH batteries provide. That said, these get really hot in camera flashes - almost painful to the touch - and they don't last very long. I think the product needs a little work yet.N.B. that the red version need to be charged in an EBL charger; they do not have USB ports.
